beforeHooks.title: "before all" hook in "{root}"
"before each" hook in "{root}"

tests.title: should run on node version v10
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Connect to Zilliqa Blockchain should run on node version v10

tests.title: should connect to the blockchain and get the right chain_id
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Connect to Zilliqa Blockchain should connect to the blockchain and get the right chain_id

tests.title: should have correct admin address
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Deployment Checks should have correct admin address

tests.title: should have correct company address
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Deployment Checks should have correct company address

tests.title: should have correct base price
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Deployment Checks should have correct base price

tests.title: should be "paused" on contract creation
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Deployment Checks should be "paused" on contract creation

tests.title: should not be "under funded" on contract creation
tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Deployment Checks should not be "under funded" on contract creation

tests.title: should allow admin to unpause when paused

tests.title: should allow admin to pause when unpaused

tests.title: should not allow unpausing if not admin

tests.fullTitle: Treasury Smart Contract Tests Contract Tests Management Functions Pausing Related Transitions should not allow pausing if not admin

tests.title: should recalculate exchange rates when receiving ZIL that is not for buying tokens
